Position The Hotel Brisino is situated on the hills just 3 km from Stresa (5 minutes by car), 2 Km from the A26 Voltri Sempione (Exit Carpugnino) and 2 Km from the "Golf Club Des Iles Borrom√©es and Golf Club Alpino di Stresa".
Restaurant The Hotel's restaurant offers a traditional cuisine and simple, served with utmost care and quality of flavors. From April to October the restaurant is always open for half boad with three courses. Breakfast is prepared in the restaurant and service is presented with a buffet of sweet, salty, cured meats and cheeses.
